FuncDef: This command configures the service ID and implicitly the VLAN ID ranges to be used as input variables for related VPLS and SAP templates to pre-provision "data" VPLS instances and related SAPs using the service ID specified in the command. If thestart-vlan-idis not specified then the service-range values are used for vlan-ids. The data SAPs will be instantiated on all the ports used to specify SAP instances under the related control VPLS.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the range of service IDs. Values-1 to 2147483647.

Specifies the starting VLAN ID; it provides a way to set aside a service ID range that is not the same as the VLAN range and allows for multiple MVRP control-VPLSs to control same VLAN range on different ports. Values-1 to 4094.
